text: when you have multiple instances of the same module on the page, how do you scope the JS so it only affects it's individual instance?
is there a unique module ID I should be targeting in the DOM instead of the general class?
using `{{name}}` in the module will output that modules id from the page (just had to do this with some inline `<style>` declarations
